def_cn: 分画面的，分屏的(指屏幕左右两半同时放映两套不同电影或电视节目的技术)
def_en: Split-screen is used to describe the technique in making films and television programmes in which two different pieces of film are shown at the same time.

def_cn: (计算机上的)分屏，拆分窗口
def_en: On a computer screen, a split-screen is a display of two different things in separate parts of the screen.
